metadata.synopsis: Attendant chides sentry for slacking off.

1.speaker: Mirie
1.text: You're supposed to guard the door. No more slacking or I'll report you to her.
1.context: NodeContext: Chastisting. 'her' with a hint of threat -  refers to their feared behind-the-scenes leader

0.speaker: Morann
0.text: No need for that. Just needed to stretch my legs - won't happen again.
0.context: NodeContext: nervous at the thought of being reported to his feared behind-the-scenes boss.
